95 Fuck Mitch McConnell, if anything should be allowed it is the hemp gummies and drinks vs. people running around smoking blunts. posted 3 hours ago by footinmouth 9 comments award share report block Unfortunate Reality @thinkB4belief • 1d 2018: Mitch McConnell stands in a Kentucky hemp field. "This is the future of Kentucky agriculture," he tells farmers. "Plant hemp. Trust me." 2025: Those same farmers are about to lose everything. Because McConnell took $73,000 from a whiskey executive. This is what betrayal
